title: How do I view a web page in full screen or save a web page to bookmarks?
answer:
To view a web page in full screen, on the browser screen, touch Menu then Full screen. 

 bookmarks management:on the browser screen,touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111458),select bookmark,you can delete,edit or share it. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111459)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111460)

 To save a web page to bookmarks, on the browser screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111461) on the left of the address box, and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111462)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111463)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111464)
